name: .MBW File Extension
summary: Learn about .MBW files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an MBW file with Mine Blocks (Web, Windows). To do so, go to the world selection screen and select Load from file. Then, navigate to and open your MBW file. Finally, select Enter world to enter the world your MBW file contains.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

images.alt: Screenshot of a .mbw file in Zanzlanz Mine Blocks
images.caption: MBW file open in Zanzlanz Mine Blocks
